name: Mortal Kombat 11: Premium Edition
summary:
Mortal Kombat 11 is the latest installment in the critically acclaimed franchise, providing a deeper and more personalized experience than ever before.

The Mortal Kombat 11 Premium Edition includes:
• Main Game
• Kombat Pack

The Kombat Pack includes:
• 6 new DLC playable characters, released over time
• 7 exclusive Character Skins
• 7 exclusive sets of gear

The physical Premium Edition had a steelbook case and came with a download code for the Kombat Pack.
This edition was removed from purchase on digital stores after the announcement of the Aftermath expansion.
A new edition, Mortal Kombat 11: Aftermath Kollection, and bundle, Mortal Kombat 11: Aftermath + Kombat Pack, seem to be the direct replacements.
